transcript:
Customer: Hello ek minute ha mai.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello Pawan ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Executive: Ha ha boliye.
Customer: Good. Tushar Chakravarti Environmental Consultant se baat ho rahi hai na?
Executive: Ha ha.
Customer: Sir actually baat hui thi main IndiaMART head office se baat kar rahi hu services ke regarding baat hui thi na hamari?
Executive: Yes yes wo services change karna tha wo jo hum ha ji to wo environmental consultant ke regarding baat hui thi maine aapko sari cheeze batai bhi thi two plus one do saal mein ek saal ka service free.
Customer: To aapne bola tha aap mujhe batayenge but still koi update nahi hai.
Executive: Sir bole ki additional nahi add karna hai jo currently hai usme hi.
Customer: To kya aap sir se baat kara sakte hai kya aap sir se baat kara sakte hai?
Executive: Sir abhi meeting mein hai.
Customer: Kab tak unse baat ho sakti hai?
Executive: To ye aadha ghanta aur.
Customer: Aadha ghanta.
Executive: Hmm hmm 11:30.
Customer: 11:30 theek hai tab main unse baat kar lungi matlab theek hai unki choice nahi karana hai but iska usage bhi to nahi hai na water testing se zyada aap baki categories se lead consume karte hain laboratory testing service environmental consultant to fir kya aur even aapka water testing mein bhi agar aapse hi baat hui thi to maine bola tha wo deboost ho rahi hai uski lead consume kariye old inquiries ko revert kariye aapne wo bhi nahi kiya sir maine us din aapse bola tha.
Customer: Still wo aapka deboost ha ji.
Executive: Wo jo hai na wo jo dekhte hain IndiaMART ka wo chutti par hai thoda isliye wo koi handle nahi kar raha.
Customer: Ah acha to sir ek hi log handle karte hain IndiaMART aur koi nahi check karta hai?
Executive: Nahi nahi ek hi hai.
Customer: Ek hi hai to wo mobile se karte hain system se karte hain kaise karte hain?
Executive: Dono hai matlab mobile bhi aur system se bhi.
Customer: Acha acha to mobile app ka access kiske kiske paas hai sir?
Executive: Mobile unke paas hai jo karte hain.
Customer: Acha jo karte hain unke paas mobile app bhi hai aur wo jab yaha office mein hote hain to system se dekh lete hain.
Executive: Ha ha.
Customer: Acha to wo matlab sir kab tak available ho payenge?
Executive: Wo abhi do teen din ho jayenge.
Customer: Do teen din mein acha kyuki sir ye wali category jaise aapne abhi do category promote kare pollution control consultant and water testing service to jo water testing service hai jo pollution control consultancy dono hi aapki almost deboost ho rahi hai iski rating listing har ek cheez pe effect aa raha hai kyuki uska consumption bilkul bhi nahi ho raha hai aapke end se.
Executive: Jo water testing hai na wo band hi kar uski jagah par dusra kaun sa add karna hai.
Customer: Water testing ki jagah dusra add karenge aap?
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Water testing ki jagah kaun sa add karenge sir aap bataiye.
Executive: Wahi discuss kar rahe hain hum discuss kar rahe hain.
Customer: Like okay jaise uski jagah jo aapka agar main usage bata deti hu to jaise water testing se zyada aapne laboratory testing services kar rakhi hain soil testing services bhi kar rakhi hain use plus uske alava aapka environmental consultant kuch hi categories hain jo aapne zyada use ki hui hain aur thoda bahut aap ultrasonic flow meter isme bhi deal kar rahe hain.
Executive: Yes yes.
Customer: Okay ultrasonic flow meter okay aur ye borewell water testing isme?
Executive: Ha wo bhi karte hain laboratory mein laboratory mein hi aata hai wo borewell water drinking.
Customer: Acha acha acha agar main aapko overall consumption dekhe to bahut hi nominal sa consumption rehta hai matlab product line mein daily requirement nahi aati hai ya kaisa hota hai dealing isme?
Executive: Nahi requirement to nahi aa rahi daily.
Customer: Okay agar aapka pollution control lead bhi nahi aa rahi.
Customer: Sir lead na aane ka to karan dekhiye wahi hai ki kyuki product line mein competition hai demand hi limited hai to supply bhi utni hogi plus uske accordingly usage bhi aapka bahut hi kam hai hamara system AI based hai aap agar use nahi karenge lead purchase nahi karenge to by default hi uski listing down hone lagegi abhi pollution control consultancy ki jo hai lead jitni bhi aayi hui hai total IndiaMART pe aapne usko ek bhi nahi consume kiya hai is month mein.
Customer: To waha pe bhi wo sari cheeze dikhti hai na sir ki aapka consumption nahi hai pattern nahi hai.
Executive: Wo lead matlab aane se pehle hi matlab wo lead sell ho jati hai hume dikhti hi nahi lead aisa hai. ab to wo lead mein hai na tabhi dikhta hai.
Customer: To wo hota hai na sir dekhiye aapne jo services de rakhi hai aapka promotion jo hai wo 10 cities mein ho raha hai theek hai aapne apne aas paas ke 10 cities Maharashtra ke promote kiye ab jo koi pan India level pe hai usko Maharashtra ka bhi koi bhi shahar se lena dena nahi hai usko agar koi Delhi se bik raha hai to bhi nahi hai to jiska pura demand limited hi nahi hai to waha pe to consumption thoda jaldi hoga to aapko thoda sa timely basis pe waha pe dekhna padega use karna padega I am interested mark karna padega aapka recency bhi kafi kam hai aap kafi der ke baad lead consume karte hain sir.
Customer: Jo char ghante paanch ghante aath ghante 10 ghante ki hoti hai usme aapka consumption zyada ho raha hai jo recent ki ek ghante do ghante ke andar hoti hai usme aapka consumption bhi kam hai.
Customer: Thoda sa hume wo sari cheeze check karni padegi aap wo sir se meri baat agar kara dete to better tha main unhe pura video meeting pe cheeze dikhati zyada time nahi lagta 10 15 minute se zyada nahi lagta hai sir aapko pata hai.
Executive: Theek hai main sir se baat karta hu aapko aapko wo jis din whatsapp par message kiya tha wahi ho na.
Customer: Ji ji bilkul wahi hu main.
Executive: Theek hai main aapko message karta hu fir fir aap schedule kar lenge.
Customer: Ha bilkul theek hai aap mujhe bata dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Okay sir okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to change services, no update yet.

- Water testing leads are deboosted.

- Old inquiries not reverted.

- Consumption and pattern not good.

- Lead consumption is delayed.



Resolution:

- Executive said the person is on leave.

- Executive will discuss with the concerned person.

- Executive will schedule a meeting with the customer.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will message the customer to schedule meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, buyleads, water testing, services, consumption
